content.text:
# Golden Goblet Award for Best Documentary Film

The Golden Goblet Award for Best Documentary Film () is a highest prize awarded to films in the documentary category of competition at the Shanghai International Film Festival.
Award Winners
{| class="wikitable"
|-
! Year !! Film !! Country
|-
| 2015 || The Verse of Us || Wu Feiyue/Qin Xiaoyu
|-
| 2016 || When Two Worlds Collide || Heidi Brandenburg/Mathew Orzel
|-
| 2017 || When Paul Come Over the Sea - Journal of an Encounter || Jakob Preuss
|-
| 2018 || The Long Season || Leonard Retel Helmrich
|-
| 2019 || Bridges of Time ||
|-
|2023
|Anxious in Beirut
| Zakaria Jaber (Dir) / Jumana Saadeh (Prod)
